nodes.text: Horliss-Horliss was one of the four spirits that inhabited the planet Bedlam near the Bedlam Pulsar. During the Galactic Civil War, Horliss-Horliss had "thrown a shape" and soon met princess Leia Organa, who crashed on the planet and was escaping from three stormtroopers. The other spirit, called Tilotny, decided to play with them and eventually killed them all. Horliss-Horliss suggested that Tilotny clean the mess, but she ordered Splendid Ap to do it instead.
Like the other Bedlam spirits, Horliss-Horliss was capable of manipulating time and mass. Horliss-Horliss often argued with Tilotny.

Horliss-Horliss was created by Alan Moore for the comic Tilotny Throws a Shape, later collected in Classic Star Wars: Devilworlds 2. Unlike Tilotny and Splendid Ap, the gender of Horliss-Horliss (if any), was not specified in the comic.
Horliss-Horliss was asked by the Kiliks to aid them in the construction of Centerpoint Station, and created the Glowpoint inside of it.
